home.title: IODA
home.subheader: A platform for Applied Network Data Analysis
home.searchBarTitle: Jump to a Country, Region, or ASN/ISP of Interest
home.searchBarPlaceholder: Search for a Country, Region, or ASN/ISP
home.about: IODA (Internet Outage Detection and Analysis) is a CAIDA project to develop an operational prototype system that monitors the internet, in near-realtime, to identify macroscopic Internet outages affecting the edge of the network, i.e. significantly impacting an AS (Autonomous System) or a large fraction of a country.
home.otf: This platform is supported by the Open Technology Fund under contract number 1002-2018-027.
home.dhs: This platform is supported by Department of Homeland Security Science and Technology Directorate (DHS S&T) contract HHSP 233201600012C (Science of Internet Security: Technology and Experimental Research), and DHS S&T cooperative agreement FA8750-12-2-0326 (Supporting Research and Development of Security Technologies through Network and Security Data Collection).
home.comcast: Additional funding to work on visualization interfaces was generously provided by a Comcast research grant.
home.nsf: This platform was supported by NSF grant CNS-1228994 (Detection and Analysis of Large-scale Internet Infrastructure Outages (IODA)).
home.isoc: Additional funding to support this platform was generously provided by a grant from the Internet Society.
home.dos2: U.S. Department of State, Bureau of Democracy, Human Rights, and Labor

dashboard.timeDurationTooHighErrorMessage: Time duration must be less than 35 days on the dashboard. Current request is for

controlPanel.searchBarPlaceholder: Search for a Country, Region, or ASN/ISP

entityModal.currentCountInHts3: Raw Signals table to change the selection.
entityModal.maxEntitiesPopulatedMessage: Max entities populated. Please uncheck the visibility of some entities before adding more.

timeRange.title: Time Range
timeRange.text: This dropdown menu allows you to pick the time range for the data you want to inspect. Note that the dashboard limits the data to 35 days.

searchBar.title: Search
searchBar.text: This search bar allows for a quick navigation to a specific country, region, or ASN/ISP.

dashboardHeading.title: Granularity Levels
dashboardHeading.text: IODA can detect outages at three levels of granularity: countries, regions, and ASNs/ISPs

xyPlotTimeSeriesTitle.title: IODA Signals
xyPlotTimeSeriesTitle.text: This panel allows you to inspect the time series of IODA's three signals: active probing, BGP, and the darknet.

alertFeed.title: Alert Feed
alertFeed.text: This table contains potential outages that IODA discovered. The cause of an outage can be manifold and includes misconfiguration, natural disasters, and shutdowns.

entityRegionalSummaryMap.title: Outage Severity Levels
entityRegionalSummaryMap.text: This map shows potential regional outages by their relative severity. The more severe the outage, the more red the respective region overlay.

entityAsnSummaryTable.title: Outage Severity Levels
entityAsnSummaryTable.text: This table shows potential ASN/ISP outages by their relative severity. The more severe the outage, the more red the respective table cell.

entityRawSignalsHeading.title: Raw IODA Signals
entityRawSignalsHeading.text: This visualization shows IODA's signals over time. The "Stacked Horizon Graph" turns from dark green to white as a signal decreases.
